text:
Trying to use HubDB to create an attendee list as such:

*Company Name 1*
Employee 1
Employee 2

*Company Name 2*
Employee 1
Employee 2

Is there an example/community post that goes over this sort of filtering? Right now I have a simple table that includes every attendee and their company, but I think the above is cleaner. My table has two columns, name and company.
